data.title: East Central College
data.meta_description: East Central College is a two-year community college with locations in Union and Rolla, Missouri. We offer associate degrees, transfer options to four-year universities, and certificates to help you achieve your goals. Our affordable programs and supportive environment make us the perfect choice for those looking to further their education.
data.text:
Tell us one thing you enjoy about working at ECC.

The very fun environment.

What is a hobby or interest of yours?

I’m a roller coaster freak. Ask me about any amusement park, and I will provide facts about the rides and roller coasters there.

If you had the opportunity to visit a famous person, who would it be?

Zach Edey. I would ask why he chose to play basketball at Purdue University and what we can expect from him in the NBA.

If you could be any fictional character, who would you choose?

The Hulk, because he looks cool and is very strong.

Tell us one thing you enjoy about working at ECC.

Making a difference in a student’s perspective of life and expectations.

What is your favorite thing to do to relax after a work week?

Hanging out and camping with my family and friends.

What kind of music do you like?

I like Top 40 pop & dance music.

If you could time travel, would you go to the past or the future? Why?

I miss both my biological dad and stepdad and would love to hug them one more time.
